refnamediv.refpurpose: outputs next triple to ses in TTL serialization.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Outputs next triple to ses in TTL serialization. This function does not terminate the printed triple in hope that the next triple will has same "s" or pair of "s" and "p". So "intermediate" semicolon or comma can be used instead of "trailing" dot.

refsect2.title: env
refsect2.programlisting: # vector (dict_new (some big size), 0, '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, 0), for ex.: vector (dict_new (16000), 0, '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, 0);
refsect2.para: The first item of the vector is dictionary of declared namespaces. Its size should be big enough, but not greater than 16000 because the function will never try to create more than 8000 of namespaces for S and O and more than 8000 of namespaces for P and types. Thus 16000 max is possible grand total for all four.
